name: Protignes Neonatology & Pediatric Science Summit
content: We welcome you to Protignes Neonatology and Pediatric Science Summit (NeoPed 2021) scheduled on 18-19 March, 2021 in Islands of God Bali, Indonesia. This two day Scientific experience will witness the researchers sharing their expertise with our scientific community. The event would witness the gathering of the Pediatricians, Neonatologists, Medicine practitioners, Academic researchers, Students, Industry experts, Physicians, Surgeons and Medicine research enthusiasts.
